title: Bloomberg Markets: `Long Strange Trip' of Grateful Dead

description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Amir Bar-Lev Director Discussing his documentary "Long Strange Trip: The Untold Story of the Grateful Dead."
